attributes.action: reject proposals to create a single unitary "super-size" council in Somerset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Somerset County Council proposes to create a single unitary authority in the county.  This "super-size" council would be one of the largest local authorities in England with thousands and thousands of citizens for each councillor.  The County Council's proposals would be bad for local democracy, bad for local services and bad for the local economy.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reject proposals to create a single unitary "super-size" council in Somerset."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
